verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
According to the hand of the good Lord upon us
We'll take this land, an exceeding good land.
If the Lord delight in us then He will bring us
To this land and give it to us.
Only rebel ye not against the Lord,
Neither fear ye the people of the land:
They are bread for us,
Their defence is departed from them,
And the Lord is with us, fear them not!
